short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integration with the Tiny Kitchen web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Tiny Kitchen chrome extension lets users scrape recipes from any blog or website and store them in our web app. Tiny Kitchen features Mochi, your personal cooking assistant. Once you upload a recipe, you can enter cooking mode, where Mochi will read your recipe to you step by step. You can control him with voice commands, ask conversion questions, and set timers. No more trying to find your place in a recipe when your hands are dirty!
